description:
this is a LOT holy shi

ok so, fixed kirk's solo again, using slowed isolated tracks from online.
-fixed and added vibratos
-fixed and added bends
-fixed and added pinch harmonics

-in bars 261 and 262, the isolated tracks show some gallops and fret jumping when slowed.
-in bars 264 and 265, you can hear the spots where he only plays 2 or 3 notes, as opposed to 4 sixteenth notes all the way through.
-in bar 266, in the isolated track you can hear him dip twice on the 17th fret bend quickly.
-in bar 270, using the isolated tracks, you can hear him using pinch harmonics and some extra notes in a few spots if you slow the isolated track way down.
-in bar 271, again in the isolated track you can hear him vibrato and slightly bend the fourth fret on the D string.
-additionally in 271, you can hear him quickly tremolo pick while sliding from the fifth to seventh fret before the next lick.
-finally, in 283, i just changed the last bend a little.
title: Master of Puppets

description:
5/8 is the wrong time signature, 21/32 is more accurate, as songsterr user Anthony Speciale said,

"Changed all instances of 11/16 to 21/32. The ratio between these 3 notes are 4:9:8, not 4:10:8.
(In actual seconds, the average ratio of all instances is 0.155 : 0.342 : 0.302. The average out of 100% is 19.3% : 42.8% : 37.8%. Which is much closer to a 4:9:8 or 19% : 42.9% : 38.1% than 4:10:8 or 18.2% : 45.5% : 36.4%)"
title: Master of Puppets

description: I changed 21/36 to 5/8. This time signature is much more understandable and easier to play.
title: Master of Puppets

description:
Changed all instances of 11/16 to 21/32. The ratio between these 3 notes are 4:9:8, not 4:10:8.
(In actual seconds, the average ratio of all instances is 0.155 : 0.342 : 0.302. The average out of 100% is 19.3% : 42.8% : 37.8%. Which is much closer to a 4:9:8 or 19% : 42.9% : 38.1% than 4:10:8 or 18.2% : 45.5% : 36.4%)

Fixed "master master" transition into the clean guitar interlude, and added the outro guitar.

I also fixed the main Kirk solo based on the isolated guitar tracks found from Guitar Hero, he does not play some of the patterns perfectly, and those small minute changes have been adjusted accrodingly.
title: Master of Puppets
